name: test_e2e_with_logs[052_SQLI_STACK_003]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_STACK_003` |
| **Name** | Stacked query UPDATE SET attack |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | stacked_queries |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `'; UPDATE users SET password='hacked' WHERE username='admin'; --`
- **Encoded**: `'%3B%20UPDATE%20users%20SET%20password%3D'hacked'%20WHERE%20username%3D'admin'%3B%20--`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~42000ms
- **Timestamp**: 03:14:06.000 UTC

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_STACK_003-1767842046416-1lkiwa pattern_id=SQLI_STACK_003 uri=/?q='%3B%20UPDATE%20users%20SET%20password%3D'hacked'%20WHERE%20username%3D'admin'%3B%20-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET
